Class SolarMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • SolarMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SolarSystemController

    public class SolarMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements SolarSystemController
    A class to implement the gui and take in inputs from the user to insert solar objects into the solar system

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SolarMain()
      A main constructor that displays the gui Randomly scatters solarobjects as stars Contains a while loop that is continuous and inserts any solarobject inputted by the user in the gui Inserts the Sun which is made with multiple solar objects to make it look more realistic A method from the SolarSystem class to refresh the display after every loop

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(java.lang.String name, double orbitalDistance, double initialAngle, double size, double speed, java.lang.String colour)
      An add method that inserts solar objects (orbitting the sun) with the parameters provided by the user
      void add(java.lang.String name, double orbitalDistance, double initialAngle, double size, double speed, java.lang.String colour, java.lang.String parentName)
      An add method that inserts solar objects (orbitting another solar object) with the parameters provided by the user
      void remove(java.lang.String name)
      An add method that removes any solar objects with the parameters provided by the user

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • SolarMain

        A main constructor that displays the gui Randomly scatters solarobjects as stars Contains a while loop that is continuous and inserts any solarobject inputted by the user in the gui Inserts the Sun which is made with multiple solar objects to make it look more realistic A method from the SolarSystem class to refresh the display after every loop

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String name,
                double orbitalDistance,
                double initialAngle,
                double size,
                double speed,
                java.lang.String colour)
        An add method that inserts solar objects (orbitting the sun) with the parameters provided by the user
        Specified by:
        add in interface SolarSystemController
        Parameters:
        name - name of solarobject
        orbitalDistance - Distance of solar object from sun
        intialAngle - Initial angle of the solar object
        size - size of the object
        speed - speed of orbitting
        colour - colour of the object

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String name,
                double orbitalDistance,
                double initialAngle,
                double size,
                double speed,
                java.lang.String colour,
                java.lang.String parentName)
        An add method that inserts solar objects (orbitting another solar object) with the parameters provided by the user
        Specified by:
        add in interface SolarSystemController
        Parameters:
        name - name of the solar object
        orbitalDistance - Distance of solar object from other
        intialAngle - Initial angle of object
        size - size of object
        speed - speed of orbitting
        colour - colour of object
        parentName - name of the object that this one is orbitting

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String name)
        An add method that removes any solar objects with the parameters provided by the user
        Specified by:
        remove in interface SolarSystemController
        Parameters:
        name - name of the solar object that needs to be removed
